text: "I Knew You Were Waiting (For Me)" is a 1987 song by Aretha Franklin and George Michael and taken from her 31st studio album Aretha. It topped the charts in Australia, Belgium, Ireland, the Netherlands, the United Kingdom, the United States and Zimbabwe and won a Grammy Award in 1987. == References == Category:1987 songs Category:Aretha Franklin songs Category:George Michael songs
title: I Knew You Were Waiting (For Me)
